subject: Baseball
Statistics
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: According to the Pythagorean equation, a team with the Diamondbacks’ 671 runs scored and 692 runs allowed should win 48.6 percent of its games, while Arizona has won 56.2 percent.
snippet: According to the Pythagorean equation, a team with the Diamondbacks’ 671 runs scored and 692 runs allowed should win 48.6 percent of its games, while Arizona has won 56.2 percent.
